body:
# lein-gh-pages

A Leiningen plugin to generate and publish github project pages. This wil

## Usage


Put `[lein-gh-pages "0.1.0-SNAPSHOT"]` into the `:plugins` vector of your
`:user` profile, or if you are on Leiningen 1.x do `lein plugin install
lein-gh-pages 0.1.0-SNAPSHOT`.

Once a project is in git and github is the designated the origin, you can generate a new  project page with the following command:

    $ lein gh-pages new

This will create a gh-pages branch and populate it with html files, as well as a templates folder with the base files. You can edit this, and then reupload with

    $ lein gh-pages update

note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
tagline: A leiningen plugin for generating and publishing github project pages
name: Lein-gh-pages
